subject: AI & Agents
title: Experiment Tracking: Know What You Tried
description: A short lesson to help you apply Experiment Tracking: Know What You Tried.

hook.text: You trained 47 models last week. Which hyperparameters gave the best F1 score?

buildup.text: Experiment trackers log parameters, metrics, artifacts, and code versions for every run.

discovery.text: MLflow, Weights & Biases, and Neptune let you compare runs side by side.

twist.text: Without tracking, you'll re-run experiments, lose winning configs, and waste GPU hours.

climax.text: Log everything from day one. Future you will thank present you.

punchline.text: If you didn't log it, it didn't happen.

quiz.question: What do experiment trackers log?
options: Parameters, metrics, artifacts, and code versions
